roleset.name: barking/speaing shrilly, snappishly

example.name: arg0
example.text: Yet , for all of Watts yapping , none of this changes the fact that the warming continues , and differant agencies have better accuracy in some places than others , depending on the methods used .

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: He completely overlooked it and kept up his yapping that she doesn't really know EJ.
example.arg: that she doesn't really know EJ

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, yap.01. Corresponds to VNcls animal_sounds-38, manner_speaking-37.3.
